info.name: DropNest API
info.description: API collection for a logistics delivery system using ground robots and drones in San Francisco. The system supports package pickup and delivery with real-time tracking.

request.description: Register a new user account. Returns JWT token and user information.

originalRequest.description: Register a new user account. Returns JWT token and user information.

request.description: Login with email and password. Returns JWT token for authenticated requests.

originalRequest.description: Login with email and password. Returns JWT token for authenticated requests.

request.description: Refresh JWT token using refresh token
Logout and invalidate current token
Get current user profile information
Update user profile information
Change user password
Get all saved addresses for current user

response.name: Success Response

originalRequest.description: Get all saved addresses for current user

response.body:
{
  "addresses": [
    {
      "addressId": "addr-001",
      "label": "Home",
      "address": "123 Market St",
      "city": "San Francisco",
      "zipCode": "94103",
      "latitude": 37.7749,
      "longitude": -122.4194,
      "contactName": "John Doe",
      "contactPhone": "415-555-0123",
      "isDefault": true
    },
    {
      "addressId": "addr-002",
      "label": "Office",
      "address": "456 Mission St",
      "city": "San Francisco",
      "zipCode": "94105",
      "latitude": 37.7751,
      "longitude": -122.4193,
      "contactName": "John Doe",
      "contactPhone": "415-555-0123",
      "isDefault": false
    }
  ]
}

request.description: Add a new address. Label can be 'Home', 'Office', or 'Other'
Update an existing address
Delete an address
Set an address as default
Calculate order price before placing order. DeliveryType: ROBOT or DRONE. Speed: BASIC (2hr), STANDARD (1hr), EXPRESS (30min). Weight in kg, volume in liters.

response.name: Success Response

originalRequest.description: Calculate order price before placing order. DeliveryType: ROBOT or DRONE. Speed: BASIC (2hr), STANDARD (1hr), EXPRESS (30min). Weight in kg, volume in liters.

response.body:
{
  "basePrice": 12.00,
  "distancePrice": 6.00,
  "weightPrice": 0.00,
  "speedMultiplier": 1.2,
  "totalPrice": 21.60,
  "estimatedTime": "45 minutes",
  "distance": 2.0,
  "availableStation": {
    "stationId": "station-1",
    "name": "Downtown Distribution Center",
    "estimatedPickupTime": "15 minutes"
  },
  "priceBreakdown": {
    "base": "$12.00 (Drone base price)",
    "distance": "$6.00 (2km × $3/km)",
    "weight": "$0.00 (0-5kg free)",
    "speed": "×1.2 (Standard delivery)",
    "total": "$21.60"
  }
}

request.description: Create a new order. System will automatically assign nearest available station.

response.name: Success Response

originalRequest.description: Create a new order. System will automatically assign nearest available station.

request.description: Get order list with pagination. Status filter is optional.
Get detailed information about a specific order

response.name: Success Response

originalRequest.description: Get detailed information about a specific order

request.description: Cancel an order. Only available within 5 minutes of creation or before pickup.
Confirm delivery receipt. Required if order has requireSignature=true
Get current location and tracking information

response.name: Success Response

originalRequest.description: Get current location and tracking information

request.description: Create payment for an order. Payment methods: CREDIT_CARD, DEBIT_CARD, PAYPAL, APPLE_PAY, GOOGLE_PAY

originalRequest.description: Create payment for an order. Payment methods: CREDIT_CARD, DEBIT_CARD, PAYPAL, APPLE_PAY, GOOGLE_PAY

request.description: Check payment status
Webhook endpoint for payment gateway callbacks
Submit a review for completed order. Rating 1-5 stars. Available tags: fast, slow, careful, damaged, professional, friendly
Get review for a specific order
Get user notifications with pagination

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Mark notification as read
Get count of unread notifications
Get available delivery types with specifications

response.name: Success Response

originalRequest.description: Get available delivery types with specifications

response.body:
{
  "deliveryTypes": [
    {
      "type": "ROBOT",
      "name": "Ground Robot",
      "maxWeight": 30,
      "maxVolume": 100,
      "basePrice": 8.00,
      "pricePerKm": 2.00,
      "averageSpeed": 15,
      "features": ["Heavy loads", "Ground level delivery", "Weather resistant"]
    },
    {
      "type": "DRONE",
      "name": "Aerial Drone",
      "maxWeight": 5,
      "maxVolume": 20,
      "basePrice": 12.00,
      "pricePerKm": 3.00,
      "averageSpeed": 40,
      "features": ["Fast delivery", "Aerial route", "Light packages"]
    }
  ]
}

request.description: Get available delivery speed options

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Get list of prohibited items

response.name: Success Response

request.description: WebSocket connection for real-time order tracking. Sends location updates every 5 seconds while order is in PICKING_UP or DELIVERING status. Message format: {"type": "location_update", "data": {"latitude": 37.7750, "longitude": -122.4192, "speed": 25, "heading": 270, "estimatedArrival": "8 minutes", "timestamp": "2024-05-24T10:35:00Z"}}
